original_title: Spending the War Without You: Virtual Backgrounds - Rocks
overview: Laurie Anderson presents Spending the War Without You: Virtual Backgrounds. Rocks is the third in a series of six lectures, looking at the challenges we face as artists and citizens as we reinvent our culture with ambiguity and beauty. The talk will consider language, lyrics and the narrator.
title: Spending the War Without You: Virtual Backgrounds - Rocks
